Title: Darkshards
Legend: Armed with fast-firing repeater crossbows, formations of Darkshards unleash a withering hail of iron-tipped bolts into their enemies, each volley piercing eyes and puncturing hearts.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: For each Bleakswords or Dreadspears unit included in an army, 1 Darkshards unit can be included in the army as a Battleline unit.

Intro: Each model in a Darkshards unit is armed with a Repeater Crossbow and Cruel Dagger.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thrall Warhost

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Lordling. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s missile weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Storm Ofiron-Tipped Bolts
Rules.Fluff: Die skies darken moments before the enemy below is shredded by a volley of iron bolts.
Rules.Rule: Storm ofIron-tipped Bolts: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with this unit’s Repeater Crossbows while it has 10 or more models.
